headline: Is Entergy (ETR) Still Attractive After Strong Multi Year Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Entergy's current share price really reflects its value, you are not alone. This article will help you unpack that question. Entergy recently closed at US$97.96, with returns of 2.2% over 7 days, 7.3% over 30 days, 4.4% year to date, 22.2% over 1 year, 104.8% over 3 years and 145.8% over 5 years, which naturally raises questions about what is already priced in. Recent coverage has focused on Entergy's position as a regulated utility, ongoing investment needs and...
